name: The Big Pig Game
description:
(Make sure you have flash enabled on your browser, or the game may not show up above!)

Help Big Pig eat all of the food and obtain the legendary pancakes! Get a new powerup with each food you eat to solve the puzzles along the way. Good luck and have fun!

(The game will save your progress automatically)

Controls:

WASD - move

K - Jump

J - Shoot (if you have the grapes powerup)

Alt Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Jump

X - Shoot (if you have the grapes powerup)

Special thanks to my girlfriend for all of the help and support!

Update: There is now Big Pig Merchandise!!! So cool!!
